Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a news article or a blog post.

content.description: The main content of the article in Markdown format.

imageUrl.description: URL of the main image for the article.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the article was created.

Player.title: Player
Player.description: Represents a player in the team.

name.description: The full name of the player.

imageUrl.description: URL of the player's portrait photo.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant image.

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents a soccer match, either upcoming or completed.

date.description: The date and time of the match.

competition.description: The competition or league the match is part of.

homeTeam.description: The name of the home team.

awayTeam.description: The name of the away team.

homeScore.description: The final score of the home team.

awayScore.description: The final score of the away team.

location.description: The location or stadium where the match will be played.

Photo.title: Photo
Photo.description: Represents a photo in the gallery.

title.description: The title or description of the photo.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the photo was added.

Partner.title: Partner
Partner.description: Represents a club sponsor or partner.

name.description: The name of the partner company.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Stores individual news articles for the club.

/players/{playerId}.description: Stores individual player profiles for the team.

/matches/{matchId}.description: Stores upcoming and past match information.

/photos/{photoId}.description: Stores photos for the media gallery.

/partners/{partnerId}.description: Stores information about club partners and sponsors.
